item.title: Stairs problem
item.dc:creator: @oron oron
item.description:
@oron wrote:

So I made my stairs teleport me up a heightLevel when I click on them

else if (objectID == 1725) { teleportToX = 2751; teleportToY = 3513; heightLevel = 1; break; }

However I can click on the stairs when I’m nowhere near them and it will teleport me without me even walking towards them. So I was wondering if anyone knew how to make it be within a certain range before climbing.

Thanks,
oroN

Read full topic
